resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103484</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103484</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206193</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Activity-Based Physics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aktivität-Gegründete Physik</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Physique Activité-Basée</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Física Atividade-Baseada</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fisica Attività-Basata</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δραστηριότητα-βασισμένος φυσική</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Física Actividad-Basada</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">presents thinking problems for physics topics: vectors, kinematics, momentum, circular motion, universal gravitation, sound, energy, temperature, and circuits. Problems include designing a roller coaster, riding a bicycle efficiently, tailgating, tuning a radio, electrical safety, and how bats and dolphins see with sound (echolocation).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stellt denkende Probleme für Physikthemen dar: 
Vektoren, Kinematik, Momentum, kreisförmige Bewegung, 
Universalgravitation, Ton, Energie, Temperatur und Stromkreise. 
Probleme schließen das Konzipieren eines Rolle 
Küstenmotorschiffs ein und leistungsfähig fahren Fahrrad, das 
Tailgating und justieren einen Radio, elektrische Sicherheit und wie 
Hiebe und Delphine mit Ton (echolocation) sehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">présente des problèmes de pensée pour des 
sujets de physique : vecteurs, cinématique, élan, mouvement 
circulaire, attraction universelle universelle, bruit, énergie, 
température, et circuits. Les problèmes incluent concevoir un 
caboteur de rouleau, montant une bicyclette efficacement, non-respect des distances de sécurité, 
accordant une radio, sûreté électrique, et comment les 
chauves-souris et les dauphins voient avec le bruit (echolocation).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">apresenta problemas pensando para tópicos da 
física: vetores, kinematics, momentum, movimento circular, 
gravitação universal, som, energia, temperatura, e circuitos. 
Os problemas incluem o projeto de um coaster do rolo, montando 
uma bicicleta eficientemente, tailgating, ajustando um rádio, 
segurança elétrica, e como os bastões e os golfinhos vêem com som 
(echolocation).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">presenta i problemi pensanti per i soggetti di 
fisica: vettori, cinematica, quantità di moto, movimento 
circolare, gravitazione universale, suono, energia, temperatura e 
circuiti. I problemi includono la progettazione del coaster del 
rullo, guidando una bicicletta efficientemente, tailgating, di 
sintonia una radio, sicurezza elettrica e come i blocchi ed i delfini 
vedono con il suono (echolocation).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρουσιάζει τα προβλήματα σκέψης για τα θέματα 
φυσικής: διανύσματα, kinematics, ορμή, κυκλική κίνηση, 
καθολική βαρύτητα, ήχος, ενέργεια, θερμοκρασία, και κυκλώματα. 
Τα προβλήματα περιλαμβάνουν το σχεδιασμό ενός ακτοφύλακα 
κυλίνδρων, που οδηγά ένα ποδήλατο αποτελεσματικά, tailgating, 
συντονίζοντας μια ραδιο, ηλεκτρική ασφάλεια, και πώς τα ρόπαλα 
και τα δελφίνια βλέπουνε με τον ήχο (echolocation).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">presenta los problemas de pensamiento para los 
asuntos de la física: vectores, cinemática, ímpetu, 
movimiento circular, gravitación universal, sonido, energía, 
temperatura, y circuitos. Los problemas incluyen diseñar un 
práctico de costa del rodillo, montando una bicicleta eficientemente, el 
tailgating, templando una radio, seguridad eléctrica, y cómo los 
palos y los delfines ven con el sonido (echolocation).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206193</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103484</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/activity-based-physics</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
